cards.title: The Baroness
setup: Put the card Vampirism into play. Flip {TheBaroness}'s character card.
gameplay: Increase radiant damage dealt to {TheBaroness} by 1.
When {TheBaroness} is dealt more than 5 damage in a turn, play the top card of the villain deck.
When a hero card destroys a villain Scheme, {TheBaroness} deals the 2 heroes with the lowest HP {H - 2} melee damage each.
When there are no villain Schemes in play, flip {TheBaroness}'s character card.

At the end of the villain turn, {TheBaroness} deals the hero with the highest HP {H - 1} melee damage. Then, unless {TheBaroness} dealt a hero target damage this turn, destroy {H} hero Ongoing and/or Equipment cards.
flippedGameplay: Increase radiant damage dealt to {TheBaroness} by 1.
When {TheBaroness} is dealt more than 5 damage in a turn, play the top card of the villain deck.
The first time each turn a hero card is put face-down into the villain play area, put the top card of its associated deck face-down in the villain play area.
At the end of the villain turn, discard the top {H + 2} cards of the villain deck. Put any Schemes discarded this way into play.
Then if there is at least 1 villain Scheme in play, flip {TheBaroness}'s character card.
Then {TheBaroness} deals the hero target with the lowest HP {H - 2} melee damage. Unless {TheBaroness} dealt a hero target damage this turn, destroy {H} hero Ongoing and/or Equipment cards.
flippedAdvanced: At the end of the villain turn, {TheBaroness} regains {H - 2} HP.

openingLines.default: You believe zat you can oppose [b]me[/b]? How delightful!

cards.title: Ageless Enmity
body: {TheBaroness} deals the hero target with the highest HP 5 melee damage.
Play the top card of the villain deck.
Destroy a Scheme.
If there are {H - 2} or fewer villain Schemes in play, discard the top 5 cards of the villain deck. Put any Schemes discarded this way into play.

flavorQuotes.text: I tire of your games, Bruzer{BR}Stevens. Surely you cannot sink to oppose{BR}me, who mastered zee game before your{BR}great-grandfahzer vas born?

cards.flavorReference: The Baroness, Bastion City: A Spider Never Blinks #17

cards.title: Arcane Veins
body: Increase infernal damage dealt by {TheBaroness} by 1.
At the end of the villain turn, reveal {H - 2} cards from the top of the villain deck. Put any revealed Spells into play. Discard the other revealed cards.

flavorQuotes.text: Your spells are painted on your skin,{BR}mine etched vissin my veins.

cards.flavorReference: The Baroness, Bastion City: A Spider Never Blinks #23

cards.title: By the Throat
body: Play this card next to an active hero. When that target leaves play, destroy this card.
Increase damage dealt to that hero by 1.
At the start of that hero's turn, {TheBaroness} deals them 2 melee damage and regains 2 HP.
When {TheBaroness} is dealt {H} or more damage from a single source, destroy this card.

flavorQuotes.text: I don't know! Shoot her! Shoot me! Do{BR}[b]something![/b]

cards.flavorReference: Burgess, Bastion's Best: Dark October One-Shot

cards.title: Cloud of Bats
body: When this card enters play, destroy Winged Terror.
When a Bat is dealt damage, reduce damage dealt to Bats by 1 this turn. Blood cards have a maximum HP of 4 and are villain Bats.
At the start of the villain turn, each Bat deals each hero target 1 projectile damage. If less than 4 damage is dealt this way, destroy this card.

flavorQuotes.text: Everything was going fine until that{BR}weird lady exploded into an endless{BR}swarm of bats.

cards.flavorReference: Burgess, Bastion's Best: Dark October One-Shot

cards.title: Death's Call
body: Each hero destroys one of their non-character cards for each point of resonance they have.
For each card destroyed this way, destroy 1 Blood card owned by that hero.
Then {TheBaroness} deals each hero target that did not destroy a card in this way {H - 1} infernal damage.

flavorQuotes.text: By all means, shine your little lights{BR}into zee darkness... but you cannot beat{BR}zee night.

cards.flavorReference: The Baroness, Bastion's Best: Black Thorn Academy #15

cards.title: Draw Out the Blood
body: {TheBaroness} deals each non-villain target 1 infernal damage.
Put the top card of each hero deck face-down in the villain play area.

flavorQuotes.text: Run if you vish, it hardly matters. If I{BR}do not find you, zen your blood... it vill{BR}find me.

cards.title: Endless Thirst
body: Each time {TheBaroness} deals a hero target melee damage, put the top card of that target's deck face-down in the villain play area.

flavorQuotes.text: Quite a convincing mask, but useless{BR}here, I fear. No mask can silence zee song{BR}your very veins sing to me.

cards.flavorReference: The Baroness, Bastion's Best: Black Thorn Academy #15

cards.title: Eternal Silence
body: Destroy all Blood cards belonging to the hero with the highest resonance. {TheBaroness} deals that hero X times 2 melee damage, where X is the number of Blood cards destroyed in this way.

flavorQuotes.text: Hush, hush... soon zere will be{BR}only zee sveetest silence.

cards.flavorReference: The Baroness, Fury: Sins of the Siblings #15

cards.title: Fang and Claw
body: {TheBaroness} deals the 2 hero targets with the highest HP {H} melee damage each, then deals the hero target with the lowest HP {H - 2} melee damage.

flavorQuotes.text: You are not alive... how fascinating!{BR}Let's see what makes you tick.

cards.flavorReference: The Baroness, Bastion's Best: Black Thorn Academy #15

cards.title: Twisted Perceptions
body: When a hero target would deal damage, increase that damage by 3 and redirect it to the hero target with the highest HP.
Reduce damage dealt this way by 1 for each time damage has been redirected this way.
When this card enters play, play the top card of each hero deck.
At the start of the villain turn, destroy this card.

flavorQuotes.text: He vill show you zee way, Liana. Zee{BR}fates have set his steps. Yield to zee spirit{BR}vissin you and bring justice to zee vorld.

cards.flavorReference: The Baroness, Bastion City: A Spider Never Blinks #12

cards.title: Undying Essence
body: When {TheBaroness} would be dealt 4 or more damage from a single source, reduce that damage by 2.
At the end of the villain turn, if {TheBaroness} gained HP this turn, destroy 1 Blood card. If a card is destroyed this way, {TheBaroness} regains 1 HP.

flavorQuotes.text: Death vaits patiently for me, an{BR}unrequited love. So kind of you to keep him{BR}company in my stead.

cards.flavorReference: The Baroness, Strange Stories: Dead Reckoning #2

cards.title: Vampiric Strength
body: Increase melee and projectile damage dealt by villain targets by 1.
At the end of the villain turn, {TheBaroness} deals the hero target with the highest HP {H} melee damage.

flavorQuotes.text: Vorssless cretin! Your limbs are{BR}as veak as your manners!

cards.flavorReference: The Baroness, Bastion City: Secret Wars #15

cards.title: Vampirism
body: Face-down cards in the villain play area are Blood. A hero's resonance equals the number of Blood cards from that hero's deck.
The first time each turn {TheBaroness} deals each hero target melee damage, put the top card of that target's deck face-down in the villain play area.
When a card becomes Blood, {TheBaroness} regains 1 HP.

flavorQuotes.text: No, my dear Zsekje, zee spells{BR}you seek are written in blood.

cards.title: Winged Terror
body: When this card enters play, destroy Cloud of Bats. If you do, {TheBaroness} regains {H} HP.
Reduce damage dealt to {TheBaroness} by 1.
{TheBaroness} is immune to melee damage.

flavorQuotes.text: Ve have guests, how vonderful!{BR}Do allow me to change into somesing{BR}... a little bit... more comfortable.

cards.title: Bat
body: This card is a placeholder. Turning face-down cards into Bats wasn't feasible in the engine.
